basics.summary: I am a Software Developer with hands on experience in PHP, JavaScript, Node.js etc in the last 5 years. I also have fair experience working with SPAs in Angular 1 and Vue.js. I am also highly interested on Microservices architecture. These days, I have been exploring Microservices and Domain Driven Design.
